description: The sea train traveling from Water 7 to Enies Lobby, currently carrying CP9 with their captives Robin and Franky.

keyEvents.description: Nero is executed by Lucci and thrown from the train into the ocean
Sogeking uses Smoke Star to create confusion in the CP9 car
Sogeking successfully detaches a train car with Robin in a temporary escape
Blueno uses his Devil Fruit to pull the escaped car back
Robin knocks out Sogeking and rejects the rescue attempt

significance: The Puffing Tom serves as the mobile battleground for the rescue attempt, with the Straw Hats trying to save Robin while CP9 maintains control. It's transporting everyone to Enies Lobby where the arc's climax will occur.

description: A prototype sea train known for its extreme speed and lack of brakes, being used by Luffy's group to pursue the Puffing Tom to Enies Lobby.

keyEvents.description: The crew encounters Yokozuna the frog on the tracks
Yokozuna successfully knocks the Rocketman off its tracks

significance: The Rocketman represents Luffy's group's desperate pursuit of Robin, facing obstacles like Yokozuna even as they race to catch up to CP9.

description: The Judicial Island, also known as the Island of Justice, is a World Government stronghold where criminals are processed. It is perpetually daylight on this island.

keyEvents.description: Enies Lobby's silhouette first appears on the horizon as the Puffing Tom approaches

significance: The first glimpse of Enies Lobby marks a major turning point in the arc, signaling that the conflict is about to escalate dramatically. This is where Robin's fate will be decided and where the Straw Hats will launch their most daring rescue mission yet.

description: The underwater railway tracks connecting Water 7 to Enies Lobby, designed by Tom to allow sea trains to travel between islands.

keyEvents.description: Yokozuna stands on the tracks and derails the Rocketman

significance: The tracks serve as the path to Enies Lobby and the scene of Yokozuna's intervention, adding another challenge to Luffy's pursuit.
